MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the CH3 Waverton area of Chester. This is causing a flickering supply to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 3:07am. Our next available engineer will attend site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:15am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:42am on 20th January 2021
